text: Prospective participants who are interested in joining Quaterly Project will fill out QP interest form, which can be founded on the bottom of this page.
Participants will be put into teams of 5 based on their experience and interests
Each team will be assigned a mentor.
At the end of the quarter, teams will showcase their project to judges including professors, industry experts, IEEE officers, and fellow participants
Winning teams will walk away with prizes!
